definition[0]: the work and organization of things that need to be done in a house, hotel etc, for example cooking and buying food
example[0]: the company in charge of the catering and housekeeping at the college
definition[1]: an amount of money that is kept and used to pay for food and other things needed in the home
definition[2]: jobs that need to be done to keep a system working properly
definition[3]: the work and organization of the things that need to be done in a house or hotel, such as cleaning and cooking
example[1]: Guests must vacate their rooms by 11 a.m. so that the housekeeping staff can clean the rooms.
definition[4]: jobs that need to be done regularly to keep a system, organization etc working properly
example[2]: The scandal at the bank was first dismissed as a housekeeping problem.
